content:
path /monitoring/v2/stacks/stackid/monitors/monitorid/errors
operationId GetMonitorErrors
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
name monitorid
description A monitor ID
in path
required True
schema
type string
summary Get monitoring errors
responses
200
v2GetMonitorErrorsResponse
type object
results
type array
v2MonitorError
type object
properties
monitorId
type string
description The monitor identifier associated with the error
locations
type array
monitoringv2Location
type object
properties
id
type string
description A locations unique identifier
name
type string
description A locations name
city
type string
description A locations city
cityCode
type string
description A locations city expressed as an IATA airport code
country
type string
description A locations country
countryCode
type string
description A locations ISO31661 alpha2 country code
provider
type string
description A locations network provider
ipAddresses
type string
description The IP addresses of a location

The IP addresses where monitoring checks originate from
hasIpv4
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a location supports IPv4 monitoring checks
hasIpv6
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a location supports IPv6 monitoring checks
description A location which performs monitoring checks
description A list of locations that have the error
error
type string
description The error text for a monitor error
createdAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a monitor error was created
description An error that ocurred during a monitoring check
description The requested monitor errors
description A response from a request to retrieve errors for a monitor
